headline: N.Y. Public Library Lists Top Checked-Out Books
abstract: More than half are children’s books, but “1984,” “To Kill a Mockingbird” and “Fahrenheit 451” also made the list.
lead_paragraph: New York Public Library books have been circulating among New York City homes for 125 years. Now the library system, the largest of its kind in the United States, has crunched the numbers to come up with the 10 most checked-out books in its history.
keywords: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone (Book)
How to Win Friends and Influence People (Book)
